scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude '@dogu**/*'  --jobs unlimited -ptvi run build
scripts.env:e2e: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude '@dogu**/*'  --jobs unlimited -ptvi run env:e2e
scripts.env:local: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude '@dogu**/*' --jobs unlimited -ptvi run env:local
scripts.env:prod: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude '@dogu**/*'  --jobs unlimited -ptvi run env:prod
